0.text: Bug 22868  Eclipse hangs while creating a shell from ControlExample.

1.text: Eclipse 2.0.1 Build 21 Aug 1513 was installed on a Solaris 8 machine and was  run through Exceed  V7.1 Xterm window on Windows 2000    Install SWT examples and run ControlExample.

4.text: From available tabs select "Shell" and click on it to open 3.

5.text: Select the following options in shell creation:          Parent + Primary Modal + SWT resize + SWT on Top 4.

6.text: Click on "Create shell"    Result: Shell creation is not finished.

7.text: Eclipse crashes and no controls may be activated.

8.text: Eclipse may be restarted only after killing Eclipse and Java           processes on the machine
